definitions.definition: the speed at which someone or something moves, or with which something happens or changes:
to make other people in a race go faster by going faster yourself
the ability of a football player or team to move quickly with the ball:
examples: He plays on the right wing and has pace as well as skill.

definitions.definition: to get someone to run a race at a particular speed, for example by running with them
to be careful not to do something too quickly, so that you do not get too tired to finish it:
examples: No more soup, thank you. I'm pacing myself so that I have room for a dessert.
